com.jumio.nv.nfc.custom

Interface NetverifyCustomNfcInterface


  • public interface NetverifyCustomNfcInterface
    Interface for status updates from the custom Netverify NFC scanning

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onNetverifyNfcError(java.lang.String errorMessage, boolean retryable)
      An error occured during the process
      void onNetverifyNfcFinished()
      The NFC scanning has been finished
      void onNetverifyNfcStarted()
      The NFC scanning has been started.
      void onNetverifyNfcSystemSettings()
      NFC is disabled on the device.
      void onNetverifyNfcUpdate(int progress)
      Update notification of the NFC scanning.

    • Method Detail

      • onNetverifyNfcStarted

        void onNetverifyNfcStarted()
        The NFC scanning has been started. The document should not be removed now.

      • onNetverifyNfcUpdate

        void onNetverifyNfcUpdate(int progress)
        Update notification of the NFC scanning. Called after every major scanning step (7)
        Parameters:
        progress - Progress indicator (0-7)

      • onNetverifyNfcFinished

        void onNetverifyNfcFinished()
        The NFC scanning has been finished

      • onNetverifyNfcSystemSettings

        void onNetverifyNfcSystemSettings()
        NFC is disabled on the device. Guide the user to open the system settings and enable NFC.

      • onNetverifyNfcError

        void onNetverifyNfcError(java.lang.String errorMessage,
                         boolean retryable)
        An error occured during the process
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - the localized error message
        retryable - true when NetverifyCustomNfcPresenter.retry() can be called
